activities: Edie Parker LLC receives personal information from the EU/EEA and Switzerland as a result of the operations related to www.edie-parker.com. In general, the personal information we collect enables us to provide goods and services to customers and helps us to personalize and improve the experience at our web site. We use the information for different purposes depending upon the goods or services being provided. Among other things, these purposes may include the following: handling orders; delivering products and services; processing payments; communicating with customers about orders, products, services and promotional offers; updating our records and generally maintaining customer accounts; displaying content; and recommending merchandise and services that might be of Interest to our customers. We also use this information to prevent or detect fraud or abuses of our web sites, and enable third parties to carry out technical, logistical or other functions on our behalf.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: International Centre for Dispute Resolution/American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA)
